title: The Godfathers (rap duo)
text:
The Godfathers is an American New York-based hardcore hip hop group formed in 2011 by horrorcore rapper and record producer Necro from Brooklyn and mafioso rapper Kool G Rap from Queens. The duo's debut studio album Once Upon a Crime was released on November 19, 2013, via Psycho+Logical-Records.


== Discography ==
Albums
2013: Once Upon a Crime
Mixtapes
2011: The Pre-Kill Volume I
2012: The Pre-Kill Volume II
Music videos
2013: "Heart Attack"
2014: "Unsub"
Guest appearances
2012: "The System" from The Murder Murder Kill Kill EP
